Senior Technical Architect | Enterprise Modernization | Cloud & AI Enablement

Senior Technical Architect specializing in legacy modernization, cloud and hybrid platforms, and high-reliability enterprise systems. I design API-first, microservices-based architectures, lead complex integrations, and apply AI pragmatically to improve real-world business workflows.

Cloud & Hybrid Platforms Legacy → Modern Architecture Identity & Security Enterprise Integrations Applied AI Systems

Core Focus Areas

Cloud & Hybrid Platforms

Designing secure, resilient cloud and hybrid platforms across AWS and Azure, with a strong emphasis on scalability, cost efficiency, and operational reliability. Architecting systems that balance cloud-native capabilities with enterprise constraints and long-term maintainability.

Legacy → Modern Architecture

Transforming legacy monolithic systems into modern, API-first and microservices-based architectures. Driving measurable improvements in performance, reliability, and deployment velocity through pragmatic modernization strategies—without disrupting running businesses.

Identity & Security

Building robust identity and access architectures using OAuth2 and OIDC, beyond basic JWT implementations. Designing centralized authentication, authorization, and policy enforcement models aligned with Zero Trust principles and enterprise security standards.

Enterprise Integrations

Enabling seamless multi-platform integrations across complex ecosystems. Experience integrating document collaboration systems (Collabora CODE), billing and invoicing platforms, and external rating, validation, and verification services using secure, well-governed APIs.

Applied AI Systems

Applying AI pragmatically to enterprise platforms—focusing on real operational value rather than hype. Designing and integrating RAG pipelines, vector databases, and localized LLMs to introduce contextual intelligence, automation, and decision support into existing workflows.

Product Architecture & UX Enablement

Integrating architecture, product thinking, and user experience to ensure technical decisions translate into usable, configurable, and scalable products. Driving UX consistency, platform configurability, and developer experience across enterprise systems.
